Welcome to the KForge Project

What Is KForge?

KForge is an open-source (GPL) system for managing software and knowledge projects. Built in python, it integrates together a host of existing tools, providing:

  • User and project creation and deletion
  • Versioned storage via subversion or mercurial
  • Project management (tickets, planning etc) via trac
  • Wiki via trac or moinmoin
  • Blog via wordpress
  • Connection of all these services to KForge's authentication and authorization system
  • Plugin system so new services and features can be easily added

KForge is the software running http://knowledgeforge.net/ (where you are right now), and if you want to try it out there is a demo site at http://demo.kforgeproject.com.

More Information

For more information, plus the docs, see the trac wiki.
